resources.string: The Computer Science Major and Specialist Program POSt require specific grades in the courses listed below. Please provide your numerical grades.

Computer Science Major and Specialist Programs require: 

 1. A CGPA of at least 2.5 after taking: 
 CSC/MAT A67 
 CSC A48 
 MAT A22 
 MAT A31 
 MAT A37
2. A grade of at least B in CSC A48

3. A grade of at least C- in two of: 
 CSC/MAT A67 
 MAT A22 
 MAT A37

You have qualified for the Computer Science Major and the Software Engineering and Comprehensive stream Specialist programs! \n\n Note: Admission to the Information Systems and Entrepreneurship Specialist streams will require a supplemental application.
Which Computer Science POSt program are you checking your qualification for? \n\n Qualification requirements will vary depending on your selection.
The questions below pertain to the qualification requirements of the Computer Science Minor POSt. Please provide your responses below.
Please check the box if you have completed 4.0 credits worth of courses.
Please check the boxes of the courses listed below which you have completed:

The Computer Science Minor POSt requires: 

 1. The completion of 4.0 credits worth of courses.
2. The completion of all required A-level CSC and MAT courses, including CSCA08, CSCA48, and one of CSC/MAT A67, MATA22/23, MATA30/31/31.
